org.drip.param.product

Class BondTSYParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.product.BondTSYParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable

    public class BondTSYParams
extends Serializer
implements Validatable
    Class contains bond treasury benchmark parameters - the treasury benchmark set, and the names of the treasury and the EDF IR curves.
